marker.ph: /// Dictionary of event to be fired when virtual button is pushed down ...
/// Dictionary of event to be fired when virtual button is let up ...
/// Dictionary of event to be fired when virtual button changes position ...
/// Dictionary of event to be fired every MonoBehaviour.Update() ...
/// MonoBehaviour updates all keys being tracked every frame ...
/* For every frame, update the virtual button by going through every key that contributes to it ... */
/* virtualRealPair.Key is the name of the virtual key ... */
/// Method to add a custom event function to be fired when a key meets the InputEventType ...
/// Adds a new keymap to the manager ...
/// Removes a keymap from the manager ...
/// Damages the player by the given amount ...
/// Only to be called within Player class, runs nessecary procedure to kill player ...
/* The main class. Should only be instantiated once; will track all input for you, make requests to it ... */
/// Dictionary of inputs to be tracked ...
/// Dictionary of events when key is pressed down ...
/// Dictionary of events when key is let up ...
/// Dictionary of events when key changes position ...
/// MonoBehaviour updates all keys being tracked every frame ...
/* do something with input.Value or input.Key ... */
/// Method to add input to the dictionary for tracking ...
/// Method to remove input from the dictionary ...
/// Method to get status of a certain key ...
/// Method to get just position of a certain key ...
/// Method to add a custom event function to be fired when a key meets the InputEventType ...
/// Describes the type of item a thing is ...
/// Items that improve the player's health in some way ...
/// Items that aid the player in combat in some way ...
/// Items that are collected for the sake of narrative ...
/// The class that all items should inherit from ...
/// Hard tracks the player by centering them on the screen (+offset) ...
/// The player can push the screen around by walking into the boundaries ...
/// When the player hits a boundary the camera will move to center on them (+offset) ...
/* Initialise ChappersCam, then set RunCamera to true ... */
/* Get difference between donut position and origin ... */
/// A key or button is a binary key of only 2 positions. A standard key. ...
/// An axis is a 2-dimensional analogue input, like a thumbstick. ...
/// A trigger is a 1-dimensional analogue button, like the triggers on an XInput Device ...
/// A mouse is a 2-dimensional digital input whose position is given in a percentage of the screen ...
/// A touch is a 2-dimensional digital input whose position is given as an exact screen position ...
/// An accelerometer is a 3-dimensional input that is tracked by the accelerometer-enabled device ...
/// A virtual key, used by KeyMaps and KeyMapManager ...
/// Enum describing the input event type ...
/// The input was pressed all the way ...
/// The input was returned to its normal position ...
/// A blank delegate to insert anonymous methods with for events ...
/// Class containing all the data for a single input instance ...
/// The delta position between last frame and this frame ...
/// The time the key has been in its current position ...
/// The total time the key has been tracked for ...
/// The delta position between last frame and this frame ...
/// The time the key has been in its current position ...
/// The total time the key has been tracked for ...
/// The timestamp of the last update ...
/// The time delta between the last update and now ...
/// Called by InputHandler, should not be invoked by user ...
/// Dictionary of event to be fired when virtual button is pushed down ...
/// Dictionary of event to be fired when virtual button is let up ...
/// Dictionary of event to be fired when virtual button changes position ...
/// Dictionary of event to be fired every MonoBehaviour.Update() ...
/// MonoBehaviour updates all keys being tracked every frame ...

/* virtualRealPair.Key is the name of the virtual key ... */

/// Damages the player by the given amount ...
/// Only to be called within Player class, runs nessecary procedure to kill player ...
